name: Project Alpha
description: Project Alpha is a web application designed to streamline task management. It features a user-friendly interface and real-time collaboration tools.

name: Beta Build
description: Beta Build is a mobile app that helps users track their fitness goals. It includes personalized workout plans and progress tracking features.

name: Gamma Game
description: Gamma Game is an interactive puzzle game that challenges players with a series of increasingly difficult levels. It is designed to improve problem-solving skills.
